thread.title: Watch: Elephant chases lion, tables turn
thread.title_full: Watch: Elephant chases lion, tables turn

author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Elephant chases lion, tables turn
text:
Watch: Elephant chases lion, tables turn Article By: Megan Ellis Thu, 23 Jul 2015 3:28 PM Share Your Email Credit: GS Features/YouTube 
Ever made a decision and almost instantly regretted it? That's what this young elephant went through when it decided to chase after a lion. 
The thing about lions is that they most often belong to a pride - so if you pick a fight with one, you pick a fight with its friends. 
A video uploaded to YouTube by GS Features shows a young elephant who did just that - and ending up fleeing from the hungry pride. 
The footage was filmed in the South Luangwa National Park in Zambia. 
At 0:14, the video shows the beginning of the altercation, as the elephant confidently chases a lion. 
However the elephant runs into other lions and the tables turn. 
The lions then begin chasing the elephant while attempting to take it down. 
The elephant disappears with the lions hot on its heels, but luckily, according to GS Features, it manages to escape with only a few scratches. 
Watch the video below:
